       <mat-label>Enter OTP</mat-label>
       <input
         matInput
         type="tel"

         [(ngModel)]="otp"

         (keypress)="allowOnlyNumbers($event)"

       mat-flat-button
       color="primary"
       class="full-width"

     >

         color="primary"

       <mat-label>Enter OTP</mat-label>
       <input
         matInput
-        type="tel"
+        type="text"
         placeholder="Enter OTP"
         [(ngModel)]="otp"
         (input)="validateForm()"
         (keypress)="allowOnlyNumbers($event)"
